editorialNotes.standard: If you can imagine it, you can create it—anything from monolithic towers to cavernous rollercoasters. That’s the idea that sparked a world-building phenomenon in Mojang’s amazing Minecraft. Since the game's release on the App Store, a steady stream of meaningful updates has kept this cube-filled universe fun, fresh and jam-packed with exciting features.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Frequent/Intense Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Just from reading the title, you know your objective. But as you explore amazing paper-cutout landscapes, you’ll uncover a weird world dense with secrets and danger. Slick controls make traveling and harvesting food simple, but balancing your hunger and health—and sanity—requires crafting weapons, traps, machines and more. With tons of mysteries to uncover and challenges to complete, Don’t Starve will keep you enthralled.

editorialNotes.tagline: Team up to solve the puzzles

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Frequent/Intense Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: Decide the fate of your kingdom
editorialNotes.standard: This game absolutely floored us. It seems straightforward at first—you’re a king, and you’re presented with choices about how to rule as a deck of cards. Swipe right to choose one path, swipe left for another. But there’s so very much more going on, and without spoiling anything, Reigns’ cleverness, humour and sometimes agonising choices routinely surprised and always delighted us.
editorialNotes.short: Decide the fate of your kingdom in this exceptionally clever adventure.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: A heart-wrenching world of life-or-death decision making.
editorialNotes.standard: A searing depiction of life in a combat zone, This War of Mine challenges you to keep a group of civilians alive until a ceasefire is declared. Figuring out who sleeps, who eats and who leaves your shelter each night to scavenge for supplies involves lots of tough decisions, but that’s just the beginning. While rummaging through hauntingly detailed ruins, you’ll meet equally desperate survivors and wrestle with your own conscience as you choose to help, trade or steal.

Badland is an eerie sidescroller in which you guide a nondescript creature through creepy and perilous environments. Thanks to simple controls and obvious objectives, the game is instantly accessible, but winding levels and unique power-ups make each stage an exercise in careful timing and hasty strategies. As the gameplay evolves and becomes increasingly bizarre, Badland remains incredibly fun.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: The enchantingly eccentric Rusty Lake series heads underground! Solve strange puzzles in train stations representing different eras of a woman’s life.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Tear apart the world to rebuild it in this creative post-apocalyptic survival game with an upgrade system that compels us to explore and experiment.

Mesmerising from start to finish, Monument Valley offers a world of uncanny beauty and constant wonder. To help a princess proceed on her mysterious quest, you’ll face ingenious puzzles that involve lifting and spinning the environment in seemingly impossible ways. It’s a mind-bending journey filled with the joy of discovery, making Ustwo’s adventure a must-play for gamers of every experience level.
editorialNotes.short: Traverse mind-bending levels that are structurally impossible

name: Tick Tock: A Tale for Two

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: One of the most influential RPGs of all time, Final Fantasy VII takes you on an unforgettable journey through a harsh and unforgiving sci-fi landscape. Packed with tense turn-based combat and an extraordinary story, Square Enix’s masterpiece is as exhilarating now as it was when it was first released in 1997.

Don’t be fooled by the cute visuals and quirky dialogue. Beneath the charming sheen, Warbits is a deceptively complex strategy game. As you make your way through a campaign packed with turn-based battles, you’re forced to make tough decisions. Do you try to stealthily capture an enemy base or wage a full-on assault and put your strongest units at risk? With a challenging campaign and several multiplayer game types (including a same-screen local mode!), your tactics will be put to the test.
editorialNotes.short: Devise complex strategies to come out on top.

editorialNotes.tagline: Join the battle for Bikini Bottom

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: It might be time to use your fireplace.

editorialNotes.short: Unravel family secrets on a remote island cursed by plagues in this dark puzzle adventure.

editorialNotes.standard: For builders and tinkerers, the planet Woanope couldn’t be a better place to be stranded. It’s overflowing with flowers, crystals, animals and a zillion other resources you can quickly craft into everything from comfy furniture to vicious weapons. A never-ending string of new locations and inventions keeps this survival RPG engrossing, and its oddball humour pulls you in even more. We looked forward to every wacky conversation with our robo-companion and random alien creatures—and to the awesome discoveries we’d make when they sent us on quests.
editorialNotes.short: Fight monsters. Chop down trees. Build new things. It's a survivalist's delight.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Investigate a gorgeous alien world while dominating turn-based battles with precisely timed combos in this superbly written RPG.

advisories: Frequent/Intense Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Originally released in 2000, Final Fantasy IX set a new standard for the series—and it’s still astoundingly impressive. It’s a perfect blend of beloved RPG elements from previous entries and modernised battle encounters. As you make your way through the story’s twists and turns, you’ll encounter unforgettable characters, frighteningly powerful enemies and a wonderful fantasy world to explore.

advisories: Frequent/Intense Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: It only takes about five minutes to realize just how strange Severed is. But to rescue your family, you’re going to have to dive right in, mastering the excellent swipe-based combat, travelling through a magical realm filled with danger, and—yeah—collecting some severed limbs. Like we said, it’s a little weird. But this Apple Design Award winner is also gorgeous, atmospheric, and totally memorable.
With no time limit, you’re free to relax and fully explore every level in this hidden object game and discover all the secrets, like tapping on a snake to pop a chicken out of its mouth.
editorialNotes.short: Search for hidden people and objects in detailed, hand-drawn landscapes.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Packed with great puzzles, humour, and voice acting–plus a thrilling murder mystery–this is everything you could want in a point-and-click adventure.

name: Ridiculous Fishing - A Tale of Redemption

editorialNotes.short: The title is not misleading. This is not a simulation. This is pure entertainment.
Learn to survive in this world of both wonders and hidden dangers.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: A delight to explore, brimming with surprises ranging from sarcastic vending machines to nightmarish bosses, we’re still finding new paths, new choices, and unexpected encounters that make us laugh.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: A story of beauty and illusion

editorialNotes.standard: We couldn’t wait to go back to the land of twisty towers and uncanny beauty—and this sequel didn’t let us down. With its striking colours and level design, it’s even more stunning than the first game. New elements like light beams and controlling two characters make the puzzles even trickier. The bond between that mother and child is what we’ll remember most, though—their relationship moved us in a way few games do.
editorialNotes.short: An unforgettable adventure full of challenging puzzles and gorgeous visuals.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Enigmatic settings and storytelling enrich the mysteries of Leonardo da Vinci’s gadgetry in this escape room puzzle series’ fantastic conclusion.

Reimagining the decades-old blockbuster of the same name, Castle of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse revamps Disney's love letter to classic platformers with a fantastic new design. Whether you have fond memories of the original or this is your first romp through the manic lands of the evil witch Mizrabel, Castle of Illusion epitomizes fantastic platforming. It’s an outstanding return for Disney’s most beloved mascot.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Deliver packages to rebuild a ravaged society–and unravel supernatural mysteries–in this wild post-apocalyptic adventure crafted by legendary game maker Hideo Kojima.

editorialNotes.short: Explore uncharted seas in this beautiful, action-packed gem.
editorialNotes.tagline: Gear up for a thrilling journey

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: Game 7. An intimate and emotional love story.
